scripts.deploy:install: sudo cp /var/scpdb/interwiki/current/deploy/interwiki.service /etc/systemd/system/interwiki.service && sudo systemctl enable interwiki
scripts.deploy:november: ssh $SCPDB_SERVER_NOVEMBER 'cd /var/scpdb/interwiki && npm upgrade scpdb-interwiki --latest && npm run symlink && cd current && npm run deploy:install && npm run deploy:restart'
scripts.deploy:december: ssh $SCPDB_SERVER_DECEMBER 'cd /var/scpdb/interwiki && npm upgrade scpdb-interwiki --latest && npm run symlink && cd current && npm run deploy:install && npm run deploy:restart'
scripts.deploy: np && npm run deploy:november && npm run deploy:december
